laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Amplification and direct sequencing of genomic coding DNA
laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed the presence of the Arg271Gln mutation in heterozygosity.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of brain and spinal cord
laboratory_examinations.findings: Showed congenital, low-lying cerebellar tonsils, without full criteria for Arnold-Chiari malformation, and was otherwise unremarkable.
